title: Smart Data Models / Privacy Object
description: Information about privacy for an IoT device

type.description: Property. NGSI type property. It has to be PrivacyObject

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Relationship. Device linked to this PrivacyObject entity. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'

refDevice.description: Property. Unique identifier from the source data set

isIndoor.description: Property. Flag to indicate if the entity is installed indoor or outdoor

floor.description: Property. The floor where the device is installed when in building or equivalent

user.description: Property. Identifier of an anonymous user. This identifier is in fact a unique URN which can be used to recognize anonymously a user

purpose.description: Property. Purpose of the data gathering

recipientList.description: Property. List containing the recipients. A recipient is the beneficiary using the data generated by a sensor. Each recipient is represented by an URI which allows its unique identification. Privacy:'Low'. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'

isPersonalData.description: Property. Flag to indicate if the entity is providing or contains personal data

legitimateInterest.description: Property. Legitimate interest associated to the entity. This means for which high-level finality the data collection is made

crossborderTransfer.description: Property. Indication about the crossborder transfer linked to the entity
